content: And purchase a <style=Highlight>Lotusbreeze Lantern</style> too. If I can also have a <style=Highlight>medium-sized utility table</style> where I can sit and make hats, that would be perfect... Thank you very much!
info: NPC装修任务 - 多杰朗 - 未做好家具_多杰朗

content: Thank you so much. Mmmooo? It seems you don't have everything ready yet. I hope you can help me make a <style=Highlight>Cloudherder's Chair</style>.
info: NPC装修任务 - 多杰朗 - 未做好家具_多杰朗
